message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 70, you get 30. Accept and we're done!
I'll give you a slightly better offer. Take 60, I'll take 40. It's a good compromise.
You rejected my first offer, now it's time to get serious. I'll take 80, you get 20. Don't think you can do better than this!
I'm not giving in yet! Let's meet in the middle. 50-50, no more negotiations.
You're not budging, I'm not budging. I'll take 85, you get 15. Don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not giving up! I'll give you 40, I'll take 60. It's my last offer, take it or leave it.
You've made it this far, now it's time to take a risk. I'll take 90, you get 10. Don't expect any mercy!
I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you 25, I'll take 75. This is my final stand!
You're really pushing your luck, Bob. I'll take 95, you get 5. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you 20, I'll take 80. This is my last chance to get a decent deal.
You've had your chances, Bob. I'm taking what's mine. I'll take 98, you get 2. Don't bother responding, it's over.
I'm not accepting this. I want it all. I'll take the whole $100, and you get nothing. It's my final offer.
